articles.description: Brendan Rodgers says Timothy Castagne is recovering well after sustaining a knock in Thursday's 1-1 draw with Roma, while the Leicester City manager also provided an update on Jamie Vardy's phased return from injury.
articles.content: - Leicester City face Tottenham Hotspur away in the Premier League on Sunday (2pm kick-off)- The Foxes were held to a 1-1 home draw by Roma in the UEFA Europa Conference League on Thursday- Manager B… [+4728 chars]

articles.title: 2022 NFL draft -- Analysis of all 262 selections - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: The 2022 NFL draft is underway: Get insights on all 32 teams' draft picks and trades from our NFL Nation reporters.
articles.content:
The first three rounds of the 2022 NFL draft are in the books.
